text: Scary Movie 2 is an American comedy movie. It is a parody of horror movies. It is directed by Keenen Ivory Wayans. It stars Anna Faris Regina Hall, Marlon Wayans and Shawn Wayans. It was released to mixed reviews on July 7, 2001. ==Production== Marlon Brando was going to have a role but he wouldn't make it due to his declining health. == Other websites == * Category:2001 comedy movies Category:2000s parody movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American parody movies Category:Buena Vista International movies Category:English-language movies Category:Halloween movies
title: Scary Movie 2
